oshiSkill.name: 白銀の騎士達

oshiSkill.name: IOFORIA~!
oshiSkill.description: [Once Per Turn] Usable if your holomem with #IDGen1 would take Damage from the opponent during the opponent's turn: You may reattach 1 cheer from that holomem to 1 of your other holomem with #IDGen1.

ability: The holomem this mascot is attached to gets +10 HP. ◆Additional ability if attached to <Sakura Miko> During your opponent's turn, if the holomem this mascot is attached to is downed, your opponent archives 1 card from their hand. Only 1 mascot can be attached to each of your holomem.

name: Cilus
ability: The holomem this mascot is attached to gets +20 HP. ◆Additional ability if attached to <Kobo Kanaeru> [Center position only][once per turn]If your opponent's back holomem is downed, draw 1 card from your deck. Only 1 mascot can be attached to each of your holomem.

name: Jailbird
ability: During your opponent's turn, if the holomem this fan is attached to is downed, reattach 1 cheer from the holomem this fan is attached to to your other holomem with #Singing. You may only attach this fan to your <Nerissa Ravencroft>, and you may attach any number of this fan per holomem.
